div.p: Leaf length and width in Dryas octopetala var. asiatica, Rhododendron confertissimum and Vaccinium uliginosum grown in the warming open-top chambers and the control plots measured during the growing seasons in 2016 and 2017. In the figure, mean values are those of 32 replicates and different lowercase letters indicate significant differences at the 0.05 level between the warming and the control for each species.
